amendment.description: To provide for the protection of the rights of women in Afghanistan, and to improve the conditions for women in Afghanistan.

action.text: Amendment SA 172, as previously agreed to, was further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 172 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 172 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To provide for the protection of the rights of women in Afghanistan, and to improve the conditions for women in Afghanistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 172 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 172 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
